author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

The type was deprecated in C++23.

#### PR validation:

Compiling in the C++23 work area no longer shows the warning. Running valgrind on the unit test for the SoATuple did not show any problems.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1761
title: Removed use of deprecated std::aligned_storage
